author: Zachary Warmbrodt
title: Shake Shack to return small business loan after uproar
description: Other chains that reported receiving the loans include Potbelly, Ruth's Hospitality Group, Taco Cabana and J. Alexander's.
content: In a post on LinkedIn, Shake Shack CEO Randy Garutti and Chairman Danny Meyer said the company was fortunate on Friday to raise more capital in the markets $150 million and that it planned to return its entire Paycheck Protection Program loan "so that those r… [+1413 chars]
